trans-unit.resname: Before starting here are some explanations on the logic of the project.
trans-unit.source: Before starting here are some explanations on the logic of the project.
trans-unit.target: Avant de commencer voici quelques explications sur la logique du projet.

trans-unit.resname: I took advantage of this "Challenge" to familiarize myself with the easyadmin bundle and strengthen my knowledge of symfony by trying new features.
trans-unit.source: I took advantage of this "Challenge" to familiarize myself with the easyadmin bundle and strengthen my knowledge of symfony by trying new features.
trans-unit.target: J'ai profité de ce "Challenge" pour me familiariser avec le bundle easyadmin et renforcer mes connaissances en symfony en essayant de nouvelles fonctionnalités.

trans-unit.resname:
The project consists of two entities User and Document.
A user contains email, password, role and enable(to deactivate a user).
trans-unit.source:
The project consists of two entities User and Document.
A user contains email, password, role and enable(to deactivate a user).
trans-unit.target:
Le projet est constitué de deux entités User et Document.
Un utilisateur contient email, password, role et enable(pour désactiver un utilisateur).

trans-unit.resname: the ROLE_USER who has the right if it is not disabled to connect to the backoffice to post, consult, modify and delete documents.
trans-unit.source: the ROLE_USER who has the right if it is not disabled to connect to the backoffice to post, consult, modify and delete documents.
trans-unit.target: le ROLE_USER qui a le droit s'il n'est pas désactivé de se connecter en backoffice pour poster,consulter,modifier et supprimer des documents.

trans-unit.resname: the ROLE_ADMIN which has the same rights as the ROLE_USER plus the possibility of user management, and see which user has posted which document.
trans-unit.source: the ROLE_ADMIN which has the same rights as the ROLE_USER plus the possibility of user management, and see which user has posted which document.
trans-unit.target: le ROLE_ADMIN qui a les memes droits que le ROLE_USER plus la possibilité gestion d'utilisateur, et voir quel utilisateur a posté quel document.

trans-unit.resname: a document can be consulted, deleted or modified
trans-unit.source: a document can be consulted, deleted or modified
trans-unit.target: un document peut-etre consulté, supprimé ou modifié

trans-unit.resname: Image type documents (JPG, PNG...) can be previewed.
trans-unit.source: Image type documents (JPG, PNG...) can be previewed.
trans-unit.target: Les document de type image(JPG,PNG...) peuvent etre prévisualisés.

trans-unit.resname: Script-type documents can be viewed by clicking on "detail document"
trans-unit.source: Script-type documents can be viewed by clicking on "detail document".
trans-unit.target: Les document de type script peuvent etre consultés en cliquant sur "document détail".

trans-unit.resname: You can create a new user or login
trans-unit.source: You can create a new user or login.
trans-unit.target: Vous pouvez créer un nouvel utilisateur ou vous connecter.

trans-unit.resname: ps: sorry for the quality of the rendering, I ran out of time for the project to be more complete front and back
trans-unit.source: ps: sorry for the quality of the rendering, I ran out of time for the project to be more complete front and back
trans-unit.target: ps: désolé pour ce rendu le temps m'a manqué pour un projet plus complet en front and back
